titleStmt.title: A declaration of the protestation of Monseigneur the Mareschal d'Anuille
titleStmt.author: Montmorency, Henri, duc de, 1534-1614.

notesStmt.note: Text begins: We Henrie of Monmorency, Lorde of Danuille mareschal of Fraunce, gouerner and lieutenant general for the King, in the countrey of Languedoc ...
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
